public class Scale extends VideoFilter
This class implements the "scale" video filter.

    • setSize

      public void setSize(boolean development, @NotNull @NotNull String width, @NotNull @NotNull String height, @NotNull @NotNull String pix_fmt) throws InvalidArgumentException, UnsupportedOperationException, UnsupportedOperatingSystemException
      This method sets the width and height of the video.
      Parameters:
      development - A boolean parameter to tell the program if the user is running a custom version of FFmpeg
      width - The video's width
      height - The video's height
      pix_fmt - The video's pixel format
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the video's with or height is null or an empty string, or the given pixel format is null or an empty string
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the video's size id is already set
      UnsupportedOperatingSystemException - If the user's Operating System is not yet supported by this library

    • setVideoSizeID

      public void setVideoSizeID(@NotNull @NotNull String videoSizeID) throws InvalidArgumentException, UnsupportedOperationException
      This method sets the width and height of the resulting video by means of the given video size ID. See here for the recognized size IDs.
      Parameters:
      videoSizeID - The given video size ID
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - if the given video size ID is null or not supported by FFmpeg
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the video's width and height are already set

      Parameters:

      Throws:
